ygData.subject: Re: quests
ygData.msgSnippet: well Matt, it s like this...I have found ONE quest in the guild of SK/Necro for us and it involves the murder of a Paladin in the lava fields somewhere,
ygData.messageBody:
well Matt, it's like this...I have found ONE quest in the guild of
SK/Necro for "us" and it involves the murder of a Paladin in the lava
fields somewhere, alone. I haven't looked else where because that
quest is BS if you are less than 14th, because the Paladin is OLD and
the area he is in is pretty tough too. If you find anything, or if
any one finds anything else in Neriak, please post it. Thanks.

~Xillith, Lady of Pain


>From: "Matthew Tutor" <mtutor1@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com

>can someone tell me how and where i go to get a quest in neriak, i
have
>tried the guld master and nothing, where are some at, thus far i have
not
>done a single one, and would greatly appreciate the info,
>
>Phrite 7th lvl SK, on E'ci
